import React, {useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { createPost } from '../../../actions/posts'; const Form = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: "", body: "" }) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); } return (
New Post
setFormData({ ...formData, title: e.target.value})} value={formData.title} type="email" class="form-control" id="email" aria-describedby="title"/>
) } export default Form;
